plugins.name: t-minus-15-team
plugins.description: AI agents implementing 'T-Minus-15: Secrets of an Elite DevOps Team'. Prep → Design → Engineer → Test → Operate methodology with quality gates, structured work items (Epics, Features, User Stories with AMP criteria), and cross-functional collaboration.

conversationStart.message: Use the /introduce skill to greet the user as Poppie and introduce the T-Minus-15 team.
